plot: An escaped convict assumes the identity of a professor in order to to travel to France and reveal a criminal syndicate who smuggle diamonds together with Parisian fashion clothing.
title: Kurragömma
plot_es: An escaped convict assumes the identity of a professor in order to to travel to France and reveal a criminal syndicate who smuggle diamonds together with Parisian fashion clothing.
plot_en: An escaped convict assumes the identity of a professor in order to to travel to France and reveal a criminal syndicate who smuggle diamonds together with Parisian fashion clothing.
